name: ROOTLEG
description:
This was made during  Global Game Jam 2023!

The theme was roots! so we made a local versus game!

You  fight in a small arena, taking over farmers and fight to the last stump standing!

Note; you can't start the game unless you're atleast two players active in the main menu!

-------------------------------------------------------------

Controlls for keyboard;
-Only one player can use the keyboard-

*WASD - Move around stump

*Spacebar - Take over farmers/Attack/Spawn into the match/menu

Controlls for controller;

*Analog stick - Move around stump

*A button - Take over farmers/Attack/Spawn into the match/menu

-------------------------------------------------------------
